basic.description: This course presents additional methods  for managing and analyzing data with the SAS system. It covers as many of the following topics as time permits: Advanced Data step Topics, Manipulation of Data with Proc SQL, the SAS Macro Facility, and Analyses with Proc IML.
basic.subject: STA
basic.title: Advanced Data Management and Analysis with SASS

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: STA 5066 or permission of instructor.
